component.name: WebRadio Player
component.summary: Modern Internet Radio Player for Linux

description.p: WebRadio Player is a modern, feature-rich internet radio player for Linux desktop environments. It provides access to thousands of radio stations from around the world through the Radio Browser API.

ul.li: Minimize to system tray while playing
MPRIS2 integration for system media controls (e.g., GNOME)
Manage your list of favorite stations
Displays station logos and current track metadata
MPRIS2 integration for system media controls

description.p: Major UI overhaul for the 'Now Playing' bar:

ul.li: Redesigned layout with three lines for station, track, and technical info.
Asynchronous logo loading to keep the UI responsive.

description.p: Critical bug fixes and stability improvements:

ul.li: Fixed the 'white window' bug on startup.
Implemented a new, more compatible system tray icon.

description.p: Initial release with core features like station browsing, favorites, and GStreamer playback.
